description: Try our easy to follow Popovers With Homemade Mandarin Jam recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Popovers With Homemade Mandarin Jam Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the flour, 1 tsp caster sugar and salt in a bowl, then add the eggs, milk and vanilla. Stir with a whisk until just combined.
Pour the oil into twelve 1/2 cup muffin moulds and place in the oven. Once very hot, pour in the batter to half-fill each, then bake of 15 minutes
Turn out onto a wire rack, pierce with a skewer, then allow to cool slightly.
Peel 4 mandarins, remove inner skins, dice and set aside. Peel the remaining mandarins, then finely slice half. Remove the pith from the remaining skin and reserve, slicing the skins finely.
Halve the mandarins and remove the seeds, reserving. Wrap the reserved pith and skin in muslin.
Place the sliced skins, 1kg caster sugar, then muslin bag and 11/2L water in a large saucepan and set over a moderate heat. Simmer for 30 minutes.
Increase heat to rapid boil and cook for 10 minutes, then add the jam-setting sugar and boil rapidly for 15 minutes
When marmalade sets on a cold plate, remove the muslin bag and stir in the lemon juice and butter. Spoon into sterilised jars, and seal while hot.
Fill the popovers with cream, marmalade and diced mandarin, then dust with icing sugar and serve.
